title: Bug 116744: Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: The dynamic text element is not displaying the content correctly for a db field with three types of content: 1) HTML text within <html>...</html> tags, 2) HTML fragments not within <html> tags, and 3) Text with RTF tags.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a db field with the mentioned three types of content. 2. Use a dynamic text element to display the contents of this field. Check if all three types of content are displayed correctly.
